Caption: Dr. P. Subbaroyan (Minister for Transport and Communication) gives away prize to a small boy. Mr. R. Natarajan (Registrar), Mr. Dubey looking on. The students who are standing in the background: Mr. R V S Mani (with spectacles), Mr. V Siddhartha (facing camera, wearing a tie), Mr. S M Krishna (1966 batch). Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (behind Mr Natarajan). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C.V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
